To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015, see the Visual Studio 2015 Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 KB Article.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows Desktop (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (Korean)
Files.Notes:
Visual Studio Express for Windows Desktop lets you take full advantage of Windows with XAML designers, a productive IDE, and a variety of programming languages including C#, Visual Basic, and C++. Choose between Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF), Windows Forms, and Win32, to target the Windows desktop with the right technology for your application and your skills.

The Remote Tools are intended for computers that don't have Visual Studio so that you can debug, test, and profile apps that are executing on them. Visual Studio must be installed on the development computer that's connected to, or uses the data collected from, the remote computer. Connecting to the remote debugger and profiler that are included in the Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2015 RC is supported in Visual Studio Ultimate 2015 RC.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015 RC, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC Release Notes. For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 RC KB Article.

Files.Description: Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 (x86 and x64) - DVD (Russian)
Files.Notes:
NOTE: A new version of Release Management is available

Starting with TFS 2015 Update 2, Release Management features are integrated into Team Foundation Server (TFS) and into the RELEASE hub in TFS web access. For more information, see Release Management for TFS 2015 and VS Team Services (https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/Library/vs/alm/Release/overview).

If you are considering starting with Release Management, you should use the new web-based version. If you are already using the server and client version described in this topic, you should be aware that no new features will be added to this version. We encourage you to move to new web-based version as soon as possible.
----------------------------------------------------------
Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 supports you to configure, approve and deploy your applications for any environment. Create automated deployment orchestrations for each environment no matter how complex the configuration. Delivering your software more frequently and easily to an environment allows your testers to get to work validating your system and keeps your stakeholders involved in giving feedback.

Release Management for Visual Studio 2015 requires Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 or Test Professional 2015. For licensing requirements refer to Visual Studio and MSDN Licensing White Paper.

Note: To enable the release management capabilities, you must also install the Release Management Server for Team Foundation Server 2015. To model release processes and enable graphical views of release status, you must have the Release Management Client for Visual Studio 2015. For agent-based releases, on every target machine to which you want to publish deployments, you must install Microsoft Deployment Agent 2015. For vNext Releases, you don’t need to install Microsoft Deployment Agent on the target machine.

VS Release Notes
TFS Release Notes
TFS Known Issues
System Requirements
Compatibility

Visual Studio Enterprise 2015 is an integrated, end-to-end solution for teams of any size with demanding quality and scale needs that require comprehensive tools and services for defining, building and managing complex enterprise applications and solutions targeting Microsoft’s full Enterprise platform as well as cross-platform technologies.

Files.Description: Agents for Visual Studio 2015 (x86 and x64) - (Italian)
Files.Notes:
Use Agents for Visual Studio 2015 for distributing automated tests across multiple remote machines for continuous testing in Team Build or Release Management pipelines. The agent package can be downloaded, installed, and configured using the ‘Visual Studio Test Agent Deployment’ task from the task catalog. Couple this with the ‘Run Functional Tests’ task for running tests and collecting diagnostic data such as code coverage.

Agents for Visual Studio 2015 cannot be used for load testing, running functional tests in the XAML build workflows, running automated tests using Microsoft Test Manager (MTM) or for managing lab environments using Visual Studio Lab Management.

For these scenarios, please use Agents for Visual Studio 2013 Update 5.

For more details, please refer this page.

To find out what's new in Visual Studio 2015, see the Visual Studio 2015 Release Notes.

For a list of fixed bugs and known issues, see the Visual Studio 2015 KB Article

Files.Description: .NET Framework 4.6 Targeting Pack LP for Windows Vista SP2, 7 SP1, 8, 8.1, Windows Server 2008 SP2, 2008 R2 SP1, 2012, 2012 R2 and Windows 10 (x86 and x64) - (Polish)
Files.Notes:
You need to download and install the .NET Framework 4.6 prior to installing the targeting pack. You can find the .NET Framework 4.6 (offline installer) here or the .NET Framework 4.6 (web installer) here. This package installs the following components:
  • .NET Framework 4.6 Targeting Pack: Contains the language neutral reference assemblies needed to build apps that target the .NET Framework 4.6.
  • .NET Framework 4.6 Targeting Pack Language Packs : Contains the IntelliSense files to display help while building apps that target the .NET Framework 4.6 through Visual Studio and third party IDEs.

Files.Description: .NET Framework 4.6 for Windows Vista SP2, 7 SP1, 8, 8.1, Windows Server 2008 SP2, 2008 R2 SP1, 2012 and 2012 R2 (x86 and x64) - Offline Installer (Multiple Languages)
Files.Notes: This is an offline installer. There are separate installers for web and offline installation. If you intend to redistribute either of these installers in the setup for your own product or application, we recommend that you choose the web installer because it is smaller and typically downloads faster. You can download the web installer here. Wherever possible, Microsoft recommends you use the Web Installer in lieu of the Offline Package for optimal efficiency and bandwidth requirements. The offline package can be used in situations where the web installer cannot be used due to lack of internet connectivity. This package is larger than the web installer and does not include the language packs. You can download and install the language packs from here.

Please note: This installation file contains Windows 10 Professional N and Windows 10 Home N. Please refer to your product keys to determine which products are included with your subscription.

Windows 10 Pro N
Windows 10 Pro N is designed for small and medium businesses enabling organizations to manage their devices and apps, protect their business data, facilitate remote and mobile scenarios as well as take advantage of the cloud technologies for their organizations. In addition to small and medium businesses, Windows 10 Pro devices would be a good choice for organizations supporting CYOD programs.

Windows 10 Pro N includes the same functionality as Windows 10 Pro, except that it does not include certain media related technologies (Windows Media Player, Camera, Music, Movies & TV) and does not include the Skype app.

Windows 10 Home N
Windows 10 Home N is the definitive Windows 10 experience for general consumers. It offers a familiar and personal experience combined with new innovations for getting things done and having more fun. New features include: an all-new web browser built for doing things online; Windows Hello which providers users a warm welcome and a convenient log-on*; and great new multi-tasking features including snapping multiple apps on the screen and creating virtual desktops for more space.

Windows 10 Home N includes the same functionality as Windows 10 Home, except that it does not include certain media related technologies (Windows Media Player, Camera, Music, TV & Movies) and does not include the Skype app.

Hardware Developer Tool Kits
Download the standalone SDK if you just need the Debugging Tools for Windows 10, and not WDK 10 or Visual Studio Community 2015, you can install the tools as a standalone component from Windows SDK. In the installation wizard, select Debugging Tools for Windows, and deselect all other components.

Download the Windows Driver Kit (WDK) 10 to get the tools you need to build, test, and deploy your drivers and Windows Store apps, including debugging tools, samples and tutorials. Get more Universal Windows driver samples.

Download the Windows Hardware Lab Kit (HLK) for Windows 10 to test the performance and compatibility of hardware and drivers for Windows 10.

Download the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) for Windows 10 to get the new and improved deployment tools used to automate a large-scale deployment of Windows 10.

Windows 10 Enterprise N builds on Windows 10 Pro N adding premium features designed to address the needs of large and mid-size organizations (including large academic institutions), such as advanced protection against modern security threats, full flexibility of OS deployment, updating and support options; as well as comprehensive device and app management and control capabilities.

Windows 10 Enterprise N includes the same functionality as Windows 10 Enterprise, except that it does not include certain media related technologies (Windows Media Player, Camera, Music, TV & Movies) and does not include the Skype app.

Windows 10 Enterprise 2015 LTSB N builds on Windows 10 Pro N adding premium features designed to address the needs of large and mid-size organizations (including large academic institutions), such as advanced protection against modern security threats, full flexibility of OS deployment, updating and support options; as well as comprehensive device and app management and control capabilities.

The LTSB edition provides customers with access to the Long Term Servicing Branch as a deployment option for their mission critical devices and environments.

Windows 10 Enterprise 2015 LTSB N includes the same functionality as Windows 10 Enterprise 2015 LTSB, except that it does not include certain media related technologies (Windows Media Player, Camera, Music, TV & Movies) and does not include the Skype app.

Windows 10 Enterprise N includes the same functionality as Windows 10 Enterprise, except that it does not include certain media related technologies (Windows Media Player, Camera, Music, TV & Movies) and does not include the Skype app.

Windows 10 Enterprise 2015 LTSB N builds on Windows 10 Pro N adding premium features designed to address the needs of large and mid-size organizations (including large academic institutions), such as advanced protection against modern security threats, full flexibility of OS deployment, updating and support options; as well as comprehensive device and app management and control capabilities.

The LTSB edition provides customers with access to the Long Term Servicing Branch as a deployment option for their mission critical devices and environments.

Windows 10 Enterprise 2015 LTSB N includes the same functionality as Windows 10 Enterprise 2015 LTSB, except that it does not include certain media related technologies (Windows Media Player, Camera, Music, TV & Movies) and does not include the Skype app.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (German)
Files.Notes:
You can use Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 to create innovative and compelling Windows universal apps. The tools include a full-featured code editor, a powerful debugger, a focused profiler, and rich language support for HTML5/JavaScript, C++, C#, or Visual Basic so you can use the language you are most comfortable with. Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows also enables you to download a device emulator that you can use to test your apps on multiple kinds of devices without the physical hardware.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (Chinese-Simplified)
Files.Notes:
You can use Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 to create innovative and compelling Windows universal apps. The tools include a full-featured code editor, a powerful debugger, a focused profiler, and rich language support for HTML5/JavaScript, C++, C#, or Visual Basic so you can use the language you are most comfortable with. Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows also enables you to download a device emulator that you can use to test your apps on multiple kinds of devices without the physical hardware.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (Italian)
Files.Notes:
You can use Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 to create innovative and compelling Windows universal apps. The tools include a full-featured code editor, a powerful debugger, a focused profiler, and rich language support for HTML5/JavaScript, C++, C#, or Visual Basic so you can use the language you are most comfortable with. Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows also enables you to download a device emulator that you can use to test your apps on multiple kinds of devices without the physical hardware.

Files.Notes:
You can use Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 to create innovative and compelling Windows universal apps. The tools include a full-featured code editor, a powerful debugger, a focused profiler, and rich language support for HTML5/JavaScript, C++, C#, or Visual Basic so you can use the language you are most comfortable with. Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows also enables you to download a device emulator that you can use to test your apps on multiple kinds of devices without the physical hardware.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (English)
Files.Notes:
You can use Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 to create innovative and compelling Windows universal apps. The tools include a full-featured code editor, a powerful debugger, a focused profiler, and rich language support for HTML5/JavaScript, C++, C#, or Visual Basic so you can use the language you are most comfortable with. Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows also enables you to download a device emulator that you can use to test your apps on multiple kinds of devices without the physical hardware.

In addition to small and medium businesses, Windows 10 Pro devices would be a good choice for organizations supporting CYOD programs.

Windows 10 Home
Windows 10 Home is the definitive Windows 10 experience for general consumers. It offers a familiar and personal experience combined with new innovations for getting things done and having more fun. New features include: an all-new web browser built for doing things online; Windows Hello which providers users a warm welcome and a convenient log-on*; and great new multi-tasking features including snapping multiple apps on the screen and creating virtual desktops for more space.

Hardware Developer Tool Kits
Download the standalone SDK if you just need the Debugging Tools for Windows 10, and not WDK 10 or Visual Studio Community 2015, you can install the tools as a standalone component from Windows SDK. In the installation wizard, select Debugging Tools for Windows, and deselect all other components.

Download the Windows Driver Kit (WDK) 10 to get the tools you need to build, test, and deploy your drivers and Windows Store apps, including debugging tools, samples and tutorials. Get more Universal Windows driver samples.

Download the Windows Hardware Lab Kit (HLK) for Windows 10 to test the performance and compatibility of hardware and drivers for Windows 10.

Download the Windows Assessment and Deployment Kit (ADK) for Windows 10 to get the new and improved deployment tools used to automate a large-scale deployment of Windows 10.

Please note: This installation file contains Windows 10 Professional N and Windows 10 Home N. Please refer to your product keys to determine which products are included with your subscription.

Windows 10 Pro N
Windows 10 Pro N is designed for small and medium businesses enabling organizations to manage their devices and apps, protect their business data, facilitate remote and mobile scenarios as well as take advantage of the cloud technologies for their organizations. In addition to small and medium businesses, Windows 10 Pro devices would be a good choice for organizations supporting CYOD programs.

Windows 10 Pro N includes the same functionality as Windows 10 Pro, except that it does not include certain media related technologies (Windows Media Player, Camera, Music, Movies & TV) and does not include the Skype app.

Windows 10 Enterprise builds on Windows 10 Pro adding premium features designed to address the needs of large and mid-size organizations (including large academic institutions), such as advanced protection against modern security threats, full flexibility of OS deployment, updating and support options; as well as comprehensive device and app management and control capabilities.

Windows 10 Enterprise 2015 LTSB N builds on Windows 10 Pro N adding premium features designed to address the needs of large and mid-size organizations (including large academic institutions), such as advanced protection against modern security threats, full flexibility of OS deployment, updating and support options; as well as comprehensive device and app management and control capabilities.

The LTSB edition provides customers with access to the Long Term Servicing Branch as a deployment option for their mission critical devices and environments.

Files.Description: Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 (x86 and x64) - Web Installer (Russian)
Files.Notes:
You can use Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows 10 to create innovative and compelling Windows universal apps. The tools include a full-featured code editor, a powerful debugger, a focused profiler, and rich language support for HTML5/JavaScript, C++, C#, or Visual Basic so you can use the language you are most comfortable with. Visual Studio Express 2015 for Windows also enables you to download a device emulator that you can use to test your apps on multiple kinds of devices without the physical hardware.
